files.patch:
@@ -3,11 +3,15 @@
     android:layout_width="match_parent"
     android:layout_height="match_parent"
     android:orientation="vertical">
+    <ImageView
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:scaleType="fitXY"
+        android:src="@drawable/background"/>
     <RelativeLayout
         android:id="@+id/title_relative"
         android:layout_width="match_parent"
-        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-        android:background="#002F93">
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content">
         <TextView
             android:id="@+id/title_name"
             android:layout_width="match_parent"
@@ -40,20 +44,26 @@
             android:layout_height="wrap_content"
             android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
             android:layout_marginTop="30.0dp"
-            android:textSize="25.0sp"/>
+            android:text="惠州"
+            android:textColor="#FFFFFF"
+            android:textSize="50.0sp"/>
         <TextView
             android:id="@+id/weather_temperature"
             android:layout_width="wrap_content"
             android:layout_height="wrap_content"
             android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
             android:layout_below="@id/wether_cityName"
+            android:text="25℃"
+            android:textColor="#FFFFFF"
             android:textSize="25.0sp"/>
         <TextView
-            android:id="@+id/weather_State"
+            android:id="@+id/weather_state"
             android:layout_width="wrap_content"
             android:layout_height="wrap_content"
             android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
             android:layout_below="@id/weather_temperature"
+            android:text="阵雨"
+            android:textColor="#FFFFFF"
             android:textSize="25.0sp"/>
     </RelativeLayout>
 </RelativeLayout>

@@ -5,31 +5,33 @@
     <RelativeLayout
         android:layout_width="match_parent"
         android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-        android:background="#002F93">
+        android:background="#002f93">
         <ImageButton
             android:id="@+id/btn_selectCity_back"
-        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
-        android:layout_height="45.0dp"
-        android:gravity="center_vertical"
-        android:layout_marginLeft="10.0dp"
-        android:background="#002F93"
-        android:src="@drawable/back"/>
-        <EditText
-            android:id="@+id/et_cityName"
-            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
             android:layout_height="45.0dp"
-            android:gravity="center_vertical"
-            android:layout_toRightOf="@id/btn_selectCity_back"
-            android:text="城市名"
-            android:textSize="20.0sp" />
+            android:layout_marginLeft="10.0dp"
+            android:background="#002F93"
+            android:src="@drawable/back"/>
         <ImageButton
             android:id="@+id/btn_selectCity_search"
             android:layout_width="wrap_content"
             android:layout_height="45.0dp"
-            android:gravity="center_vertical"
             android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
             android:layout_marginRight="10.0dp"
             android:background="#002F93"
-            android:src="@drawable/search" />
+            android:src="@drawable/search"
+            />
+        <EditText
+            android:id="@+id/et_cityName"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="45.0dp"
+            android:gravity="center_vertical"
+            android:layout_toRightOf="@id/btn_selectCity_back"
+            android:layout_toLeftOf="@id/btn_selectCity_search"
+            android:hint="城市名"
+            android:textColorHint="#D3D3D3"
+            android:textSize="20.0sp"
+            android:textColor="#FFFFFF"/>
     </RelativeLayout>
 </RelativeLayout>
